scripts.generate-images: npm run resize-full-images && npm run generate-thumb && npm run generate-webp && npm run optimize-images
scripts.generate-webp: npm run generate-webp:full && npm run generate-webp:thumb
scripts.generate-webp:full: rm -f src/images/gallery/full/*.webp && `for file in ./src/images/gallery/full/*.jpg; do cwebp -q 100 "$file" -o "${file%.*}.webp"; done`
scripts.generate-webp:thumb: rm -f src/images/gallery/full/thumb/*.webp && `for file in ./src/images/gallery/full/thumb/*.jpg; do cwebp -q 100 "$file" -o "${file%.*}.webp"; done`
